section.title: Subscribing a list
section.para:
If you want to subscribe a list, you have to send empty e-mail to address: "listname"-subscribe@pld.org.pl
Use listname without quotes
Eg. if you want to subscribe to pld-users-en list, you should send empty e-mail to pld-users-en-subscribe@pld.org.pl

section.title: Unsubscribing a list
section.para:
If you want to unsubscribe a list, you have to send empty e-mail to address: "listname"-unsubscribe@pld.org.pl
Use listname without quotes
Eg. if you want to unsubscribe from pld-users-en list, you should send empty e-mail to pld-users-en-unsubscribe@pld.org.pl

section.title: List archive
section.para: Searchable archive of our lists you can find on listserver www pages.
